files.patch:
@@ -753,2 +753,2 @@ - * If this {@code Class} object represents a primitive type, this method - * returns {@code false}. + * If this {@code Class} object represents a primitive type or void, this + * method returns {@code false}. @@ -774,3 +774,3 @@ - *

If any of the two {@code Class} objects represents a primitive type, - * this method returns {@code true} if and only if the two {@code Class} - * objects represent the same primitive type. + *

If any of the two {@code Class} objects represents a primitive type or + * void, this method returns {@code true} if and only if the two {@code + * Class} objects are the same. @@ -3493,2 +3493,3 @@ - *

If this {@code Class} object represents a primitive type, this method - * completes normally if and only if the specified reference is {@code null}. + *

If this {@code Class} object represents a primitive type or void, this + * method completes normally if and only if the specified reference is + * {@code null}. @@ -3499,3 +3500,3 @@ - * this {@code Class} object represents either a primitive type or - * a reference type that is not a supertype of the class of the - * referenced object + * this {@code Class} object represents either a primitive type, + * void, or a reference type that is not a supertype of the class + * of the referenced object
